topic.title: Check Voicemail Messages
topic.shortdesc: Extension users have multiple ways to check their voicemail messages.

section.title: Check Voicemail on Linkus
section.p: Log in Linkus, go to Me Voicemail to check your voicemail.

ul.li:
Dial feature code *2 on a phone
A user can dial *2 on his own phone to check voicemail.

Dial feature code *02 on a phone
A user can dial *02 on other user's phone to enter the voicemail main menu, then enter his/her extension number and voicemail PIN to check voicemail.

section.title: Check Voicemail on Web Page
section.p:
Extension users can log in the PBX web page to check their own voicemails.
User name: The extension user's email address.
Password: The extension's User Password.

section.title: Check Voicemail via Email
section.p: If voicemail to email is enabled for an extension user, the user can check voicemails in his/her email box.

body.section:
Check Voicemail via IVRIf you check the option Dial to Check Voicemail for an IVR; users can access the IVR to check their voicemails. This solution is for the users who are outside the office to check their voicemails.
If the users are using Linkus, they can dial *2 directly to check their voicemails.
